text: Nagercoil Town Railway Station (NJT) is located on the Thiruvananthapuram- Nagercoil-Kanyakumari railway line between the Aaloor railway station and the Nagercoil junction railway station. Eighteen trains halt on this station which has one platform and is in the Thiruvananthapuram division of the Southern Railway zone. The station is in proximity to Vadasery Bus stand. Category:Railway stations in Kanyakumari district Category:Thiruvananthapuram railway division
title: Nagercoil Town railway station
